data.name: BarDiagram
desc: This is a service for bar and column diagrams.

properties.name: Deep
desc: If TRUE, determines that in a three-dimensional bar chart the bars of each series are arranged behind each other in the z-direction.
If FALSE the arrangement of bars is like in two-dimensional bar charts.

properties.name: GroupBarsPerAxis
desc: If bars of a bar or column chart are attached to different axis, this property determines how to display those.
If TRUE, the bars are grouped together in one block for each axis, thus they are painted one group over the other.
If FALSE, the bars are displayed side-by-side, as if they were all attached to the same axis.
If all data series of a bar or column chart are attached to only one axis, this property has no effect.

properties.name: NumberOfLines
desc: Determines how many data rows are displayed as lines rather than bars.
If this property differs from zero the last BarDiagram.NumberOfLines data rows are shown as lines. It is currently supported by two dimensional vertical bar charts only.

properties.name: StackedBarsConnected
desc: determines if, in a stacked chart, there are connecting lines between corresponding bars.
Currently, bar charts with horizontal bars do not support this property.

properties.name: Vertical
desc: Determines if the bars of a chart are drawn vertically or horizontally.
If Vertical is FALSE you get a column chart rather than a bar chart.
